item.title: What is Ethereum?
item.description: Ethereum is a programmable blockchain. It’s basically a global computer that anyone can use. It’s like the internet, except instead of connecting people, it connects computers. And instead of hosting websites, it runs programs. Introduction Ethereum is a decentralized platform that runs smart contracts: applications that run exactly as programmed without any possibility of fraud or third party interference. Ethereum is a public blockchain-based platform that enables the development of decentralized applications (dapps) and smart contracts.
